original_text: Many other people in the city heard about the trouble and they also became angry. They all ran from their homes to the temple and they took hold of Paul. Then they pulled him out of the temple and they closed the doors immediately.
korean_text: 온 성이 소동하여 백성이 달려와 모여 바울을 잡아 성전 밖으로 끌고 나가니 문들이 곧 닫히더라

sentences.original_text: Many other people in the city heard about the trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 성읍의 다른 많은 사람들이 그 소란을 듣고

sentences.original_text: They all ran from their homes
and they took hold of Paul
Then they pulled him out of the temple
and they closed the doors immediately
